sentence.Network_en: Besides , rapid progress was made in the divestiture of radio paging assets from the P & T sectors and the restructuring on a nationwide basis.

sentence.Network_en: The court found divestiture to be necessary in preventing a monopoly.
sentence.Network_cn: 法庭发现在防止垄断方面进行资产剥离是必要的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from medieval Latin divestit- 'divested' (from the verb divestire) + -ure

means.word_mean: 1. an order to an offending party to rid itself of property; it has the purpose of depriving the defendant of the gains of wrongful behavior;

sentences.sentence: "the court found divestiture to be necessary in preventing a monopoly"

means.word_mean: 2. the sale by a company of a product line or a subsidiary or a division

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,-sure通常加在s结尾的词根后,表示"一般状态,行为等等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: divest剥夺+iture一般状态,行为等等→n.剥夺,脱衣

stems_affixes.value_cn: 花费;[时间,金钱等的]支出,消耗
stems_affixes.word_buile: expend消费,花费+iture一般状态,行为等等→n.花费;[时间,金钱等的]支出,消耗
